info.name: Bigger, Blacker Box
info.description:
This is a small expansion pack for Cards Against Humanity that accompanies purchases of the Bigger Blacker Box of the Cards Against Humanity website.

Cards Against Humanity is a Trademark of Cards Against Humanity, LLC. Cards Against Humanity is distributed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 2.0 license.

responses.text: a falcon with a box on its head
a box that is conscious and wishes it weren't a box
a boxing match with a giant box
two midgets shitting into a box
an alternate universe in which boxes store things inside of people
a box of biscuits, a box of mixed biscuits, and a biscuit mixer
something that looks like a box but turns out to be a crate
a box without hinges, key, or lid, yet golden treasure inside is hid
